title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, some actions are distributed in the context menu based on personal taste. This should be changed to make all actions accessible from the editor without the need to switch views. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not.
OB: The expected behavior is that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be available in the context menu.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not available in the context menu.
SR: Ensure that the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is added to the context menu for text selection.
